title: Historical Stock Splits and Corporate Actions of Marvell Technology Inc

content.text: Marvell Technology Inc completes its initial public offering (IPO).
Marvell Technology Inc announces a 2-for-1 stock split, doubling the number of shares outstanding.
Marvell Technology Inc announces a 2-for-1 stock split.
Marvell Technology Inc announces a 1-for-4 reverse stock split, reducing the number of shares outstanding.
Marvell Technology Inc completes the acquisition of Cavium, Inc, a semiconductor company.
Marvell Technology Inc announces a 1-for-4 reverse stock split, reducing the number of shares outstanding.
Marvell Technology Inc announces the acquisition of Inphi Corporation, a provider of high-speed data movement technology.

news.headline: Chart of the Day: Marvell Stages a Comeback
news.summary: The chart of Action Alerts PLUS holding Marvell Technology  is starting to improve after a pretty nasty spill in October.  Back then, Marvell stock had a delayed reaction to poor earnings in August (arrow, top left).

news.headline: Here's Why We're Increasing Our Price Targets on Marvell and Qualcomm
news.summary: Micron also commented demand for AI servers has been strong "as data center infrastructure operators shift budgets from traditional servers to more content-rich AI servers."  As we adjust our target higher, we'll also lift our panic point to $49 from $45 and our $40.55 average cost basis.  Micron's outlook on the smartphone market as well as Blackberry's quarterly IoT results, and guidance last night is also leading us to boost our already above consensus price target on Qualcomm  shares to $155 from $150.

news.headline: Why Marvell Technology (MRVL) Stock Is Up Today
news.summary: Shares of networking chips designer Marvell Technology (NASDAQ: MRVL) jumped 5.6% in the afternoon session after The Federal Reserve maintained its key interest rate for the third consecutive time, holding it within the targeted range of 5.25%-5.5%. Additionally, committee members signaled a more dovish stance for 2024, anticipating at least three quarter-point rate cuts, roughly aligning with market expectations but more accommodative than Fed officials' previous statements. news.headline: 4 Top Tech Stocks to Buy and 3 to Stay Far Away From
news.summary: Tech stocks are tricky now because the technology market is in a state of flux. This year brought a big reset for tech stocks after record sales for many product categories in 2021 and 2022. As the economy reopened, people spent more on in-person products and experiences while growth of online spending slowed.
